title: Challenger - Fill player - looking for a team for OOL preferably high diamond - master - challenger
body: Looking for a team to enter into the OOL. I'd prefer if the team was averaged around High Diamond elo and/or hovering Master/ Challenger. I am currently challenger and can fill any roles needed by the team, however my role strengths are adc > jungle > mid > support > top in that order. Swing me a message in client or leave a response here and I can add you in game.

replies.body: u can trial our main team for jng if u want
hey just sent you a request in game :P
Hey man, we're looking for an ADC for the OOL. add me ingame for more details: jimuskin
